AIApplication.name: AIApplication
AIApplication.description: Represents an AI application such as Einstein Prediction Builder.

DeveloperName.description: The unique name of the object in the API. This name can contain only underscores and alphanumeric characters, and must be unique in your org. It must begin with a letter, not include spaces, not end with an underscore, and not contain two consecutive underscores. In managed packages, this field prevents naming conflicts on package installations. With this field, a developer can change the object’s name in a managed package and the changes are reflected in a subscriber’s organization.

Language.description: The language of the application. Possible values are: da—Danish de—German en_US—English es—Spanish es_MX—Spanish (Mexico) fi—Finnish fr—French it—Italian ja—Japanese ko—Korean nl_NL—Dutch no—Norwegian pt_BR—Portuguese (Brazil) ru—Russian sv—Swedish th—Thai zh_CN—Chinese (Simplified) zh_TW—Chinese (Traditional)

MasterLabel.description: Label that identifies the AI application throughout the Salesforce user interface.

NamespacePrefix.description: Specifies the namespace of the application if installed with a managed package.

Status.description: Status of the AI application. Possible values are: Disabled Enabled Migrated

Type.description: The type of application. Possible values are: PredictionBuilder
